message:
&7Illegal mouse modifications, along with clicking methods such as
butterfly clicking and drag clicking are a &cbannable offense.
Please read our rules for more information.
&7Keep up-to-date with Warzone by checking out our forums! &ehttps://warz.one/forums
&7Check out our website to view additional stats! &ehttps://warz.one/
&7Help us grow Warzone's playerbase! Type &b/ad Warzone <ad> &7from the lobby.
&7Support the server by checking out our store! &e/buy
&7Join back with the IP &bplay.warz.one &7or using &b/join Warzone &7from the lobby!
&7Found someone that might be hacking? Report them using the command &b/report&7!
&7Want to help develop the server? Check out our GitHub! &ehttps://github.com/Warzone
&7Stay up-to-date with tournaments, events, updates and more by following us on Twitter @ &bhttps://twitter.com/WarzoneMC
&7Interested in building a map for Warzone? Try checking out our Discord server! &b/discord
&7Hey there! Welcome to Warzone. Type &d/join &7to get started.
&7View the builders of this map by using the &a/map &7command.

&a&lWarzone's Returnament 2: Electric Boogaloo 
           &9Saturday, March 20th at 2 PM EST 
&7Join our Discord server using &b/discord &7for more information!

&r
 &r &r &r &r &r &r &r &r &r &r &r &2&lInfection event!
&7Join using &binfected.minehut.gg &7or join from the Minehut lobby through &b/join Infected!
&r
